Hypothetical exercise generalizing outside the sample and assuming external validity. Mean present value of lifetime earnings at age zero in Metropolitan Cebu of approximately $39,927 is used in the calculation.  Using 2023 as current year.

The $2.05 billion impact is approximately 2% of the $90 billion Philippine GDP in 2005.
The cost of the Philippine Clean Air Act of 1999 is $50 million annually. The benefits from reducing O3 exposure may outweigh the costs.
